sentences.english: Late Carboniferous granite in the Xiao Hinggan Mountains shows magma-mixing characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 小興安嶺晚石炭世花崗岩具有明顯的岩漿混合特徵。

sentences.english: The Honghuagou gold deposit belongs to magmatic hydrothermal quartz vein type.
sentences.chinese: 紅花溝金礦牀屬岩漿熱液型脈狀金礦。

sentences.english: The black rocks are all lava from a volcano which erupted here 10.000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這些黑色的岩石都是一萬年前火山爆發流出的岩漿。

sentences.english: Ha-Tu Gold Deposit is a postmagmatic mesothermal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 哈圖金礦局岩漿期後中溫熱液礦牀。

sentences.english: The evolution las of alkali rich porphyry is correlated with those of other 4 magmatic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 對富鹼斑岩和其它4類岩漿岩進行了演化規律的對比。

sentences.english: Pegmatites seem to form during a late magmatic stage.
sentences.chinese: 偉晶岩似乎是在較晚的岩漿階段形成的。

sentences.english: In Ning Zhen region, Mesozoic magmatism was very intense accompanied with frequent multiple phase intrusive activities.
sentences.chinese: 寧鎮地區中生代岩漿作用強烈，多期次侵入活動頻繁。

sentences.english: Magmas in transit to the surface will further supplement this heat .
sentences.chinese: 向地表運移的岩漿將進一步補充這種熱量。

sentences.english: Diamond is precipitated from the kimberlite magma.
sentences.chinese: 金剛石是從岩漿中結晶沉澱的。

sentences.english: The fine-grained diorite enclaves in granites and their host rocks come from the same magma source.
sentences.chinese: 花崗岩中的細粒閃長質包體與寄主岩石屬於同源岩漿。

sentences.english: As that pressure builds, tectonic tremors can agitate chambers.
sentences.chinese: 當這種壓力形成時，構造震動會引起岩漿室的激盪。

sentences.english: Plagioclase widely appear in all kinds of magmatite in.
sentences.chinese: 斜長石廣泛出現在各類岩漿岩中。

sentences.english: The magma, after emplacement, separates into dry magma and transitional ore-forming fluid.
sentences.chinese: 岩漿侵位後分離爲幹岩漿和過渡性成礦流體。

sentences.english: The magma, after emplacement, separates into dry magma and transitional ore-forming fluid.
sentences.chinese: 岩漿侵位後分離爲幹岩漿和過渡性成礦流體。

sentences.english: Since the cooling of magma, the area has at least experienced five no- table thermal events with the corresponding .
sentences.chinese: 自岩漿冷卻以後，該地區至少經歷了五次大的熱事件。

sentences.english: Magma extravasated as pressure built under ground.
sentences.chinese: 當地底下的壓力生成時，岩漿噴發。

definition: so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
